content: free knitting pattern for large and small snowmen with beanie hats https //cooldenim co uk/index php/2024/09/16/small-snowmen-with-beanie-hats/ https //cooldenim co uk/index php/2024/09/05/large-snowman-with-beanie-hat/ both patterns use stash yarn white for the body and small amounts of 2 other colours for the hats an easy knit for christmas or anytime pattern uses 3 5mm needles and dk yarn to give a closer knit for stuffing they look good in a group and can be personalised to make them different content only to be shared with express permission copyright©2024 creativeneats all rights reserved
